properties.name: CreatedBy
properties.value: apt-get update && apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends 		ca-certificates 		curl 		wget 	&& rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*

properties.name: CreatedBy
properties.value: apt-get update && apt-get install -y unzip && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*

properties.name: CreatedBy
properties.value: set -x 	&& curl -fSL "$TOMCAT_TGZ_URL" -o tomcat.tar.gz 	&& curl -fSL "$TOMCAT_TGZ_URL.asc" -o tomcat.tar.gz.asc 	&& gpg --verify tomcat.tar.gz.asc 	&& tar -xvf tomcat.tar.gz --strip-components=1 	&& rm bin/*.bat 	&& rm tomcat.tar.gz*

properties.name: CreatedBy
properties.value: apt-get update && apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends 		ca-certificates 		curl 		wget 	&& rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*

properties.name: CreatedBy
properties.value: apt-get update && apt-get install -y unzip && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*

properties.name: CreatedBy
properties.value: set -x 	&& curl -fSL "$TOMCAT_TGZ_URL" -o tomcat.tar.gz 	&& curl -fSL "$TOMCAT_TGZ_URL.asc" -o tomcat.tar.gz.asc 	&& gpg --verify tomcat.tar.gz.asc 	&& tar -xvf tomcat.tar.gz --strip-components=1 	&& rm bin/*.bat 	&& rm tomcat.tar.gz*
